subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Jim Boeheim notched his 903rd career victory, breaking a tie with Bob Knight for second all-time among Division I men’s coaches, as Syracuse opened its Big East season with a win over Rutgers.
snippet: Jim Boeheim notched his 903rd career victory, breaking a tie with Bob Knight for second all-time among Division I men’s coaches, as Syracuse opened its Big East season with a win over Rutgers.
